FWIW, I know that I and most of my colleagues rather having the
test-execut=
er "close" and overhead-free(ish). 
Running my tests from the shell or IDE =
with a few clicks/key-presses
is a strong requirement.
I think that the web=
 environment is an overkill.
But it may just be me.

Cheers,
